alert.note: Alert for Dawes; North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 6:52AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and near-blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, North Sioux and Dawes County including Chadron. In Wyoming, Niobrara County including Lusk. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and near zero visibilities in falling and blowing snow, especially along Highway 20 between Chadron and Lusk.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
